channel.title: Point methods not saving
channel.description: I added Reputation Points to players, my command to give them works, as well as take them away. Also the shop to use them correctly works, the problem im having is saving, i've added a save game button & still whenever you log out your ReputationPoints are reset. how can i add a save method to my points ?

item.title: Point methods not saving
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

[quote=“Teem_Rocket, post:4, topic:524137”][quote author=bob2568 link=topic=642678.msg4327871#msg4327871 date=1373244337]
I already added filewrites in playersave.java …
[/quote]

Copy/Paste what you’ve done then. Are you sure It’s correctly setup to save the value?[/quote]

I fixed it, i added characterfile.write("reputationPoints = ", 0, 16); instead of characterfile.write("reputationPoints = ", 0, 19); which worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Point methods not saving
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

You need to have them write and save to a Character file, ala Barbarian Assault points, Fire Cape completion, etc.

P.S. A Save-Game button for the players to use anytime is not a very good idea.

Read full topic
